hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4-Hour Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a period of low volatility (Bollinger Band Width on 4H chart < 0.02) within a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the upper band with volume > 150% of 20-period average will lead to a continuation move of at least 2.5% within the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Compression periods in neutral markets often precede directional moves. The volume confirmation filters false breakouts. Neutral regimes provide enough volatility for moves while avoiding extreme momentum exhaustion seen in bull/bear extremes.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H Bollinger Band Width (20,2) < 0.02 for at least 3 consecutive periods
Price closes above upper Bollinger Band
Volume on breakout candle > 150% of 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.stop_loss: 1.5% below entry price or below middle Bollinger Band

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to reach 2.5% target within 12 hours more than 55% of the time, or more than 40% of breakouts immediately reverse below middle BB.
